title: RepoCreds holds the definition for repository credentials

bearerToken.title: BearerToken contains the bearer token used for Git BitBucket Data Center auth at the repo server

enableOCI.title: EnableOCI specifies whether helm-oci support should be enabled for this repo

forceHttpBasicAuth.title: ForceHttpBasicAuth specifies whether Argo CD should attempt to force basic auth for HTTP connections

gcpServiceAccountKey.title: GCPServiceAccountKey specifies the service account key in JSON format to be used for getting credentials to Google Cloud Source repos

githubAppEnterpriseBaseUrl.title: GithubAppEnterpriseBaseURL specifies the GitHub API URL for GitHub app authentication. If empty will default to https://api.github.com

githubAppID.title: GithubAppId specifies the Github App ID of the app used to access the repo for GitHub app authentication

githubAppInstallationID.title: GithubAppInstallationId specifies the ID of the installed GitHub App for GitHub app authentication

githubAppPrivateKey.title: GithubAppPrivateKey specifies the private key PEM data for authentication via GitHub app

noProxy.title: NoProxy specifies a list of targets where the proxy isn't used, applies only in cases where the proxy is applied

password.title: Password for authenticating at the repo server

proxy.title: Proxy specifies the HTTP/HTTPS proxy used to access repos at the repo server

sshPrivateKey.title: SSHPrivateKey contains the private key data for authenticating at the repo server using SSH (only Git repos)

tlsClientCertData.title: TLSClientCertData specifies the TLS client cert data for authenticating at the repo server

tlsClientCertKey.title: TLSClientCertKey specifies the TLS client cert key for authenticating at the repo server

type.description: Type specifies the type of the repoCreds. Can be either "git" or "helm. "git" is assumed if empty or absent.

url.title: URL is the URL to which these credentials match

useAzureWorkloadIdentity.title: UseAzureWorkloadIdentity specifies whether to use Azure Workload Identity for authentication

username.title: Username for authenticating at the repo server
